item.title: Image-Guided Surgery Software
item.description: Integrated algorithms of robot motion planning, VSLAM, 3D reconstruction, control, and kinematics

item.title: Cyborg Mouse
item.description: Performed electrode-implantation neurosurgery on mice, built a signal acquisition system to collect their neural signals and motions, and analysed the data from mice using deep learning models.

item.title: Invasive Brain-Machine Interface Robot
item.description: Designed (Solidworks), manufactured (3D Print & CNC), and assembled (cameras with light modules+ step motors + Arduino) a precise automated neurosurgery robot.

item.title: Mouse Motion Reconstruction
item.description: Wrote a Unity3D program, developed a 3D simulated mouse, and used C# to reconstruct the activities of the electrode-implanted mouse to 3D simulated mouse in real time

item.title: Multitask Learning and EEG
item.description: Conducted research on the multitask learning and EEG based emotion recognition and person identification

item.title: Survey of Deep Learning in EEG
item.description: Read and summarized scientific papers that were published in the past 10 years on the topic of deep learning in EEG signal processing
